title: Roanoke, Virginia
summary: Roanoke (/ˈroʊənoʊk/ ROH-ə-nohk) is an independent city in the U.S. commonwealth of Virginia. As of the 2020 census, the population was 100,011,[6] making it the largest city in Virginia west of Richmond. It is located in the Roanoke Valley of the Roanoke Region of Virginia.[7]
